data.title: Rick Dees WT40 stations 80s/90s/HAC/CHR/AC
data.meta_description: here's the fresh new thread that totally updates the stations. Â Radio.nenad.net for some strange reason doesn't even update for few years.  This listing of stations will follow the same bas
data.text:
Post by kani on

here's the fresh new thread that totally updates the stations. Radio.nenad.net for some strange reason doesn't even update for few years.

This listing of stations will follow the same basic format as the AT40 shows threads, seen elsewhere on this forum: station call letters, slogan and regularly scheduled time and day of broadcast; all times are Eastern. For right now, I'm not going to list whether there is a live stream of the station, but many of these stations do have that;

Remember that because of individual station circumstances, there may be instances of stations starting the show early or late, at a different time or not at all; the circumstances vary widely.

www.timeanddate.com is a great site for converting time zones. I list the times in EST (eastern time zones)

I am sorting this in order of day and time starting with Saturday 12AM and to end Sunday/Monday 12AM

EDIT: As of Sat May 6, 2017, www.rick.com will no longer be used for streaming as it has removed audio shows from that site. Instead these shows will be used on the Rick Dees App, but you have to download from iphone, smartphone, ipad, tablet, or any mobile devices. Then you have to create an account for you to listen. It includes Hot AC, CHR, 80s, 90s, D2K (2000s). But sadly no top 20 AC on the app feature. There are some other features: Hit App, etc.. i may have to check on that.

These shows will update by at least Friday night or Saturday (that really depends how it's scheduled). The app is only for USA viewers, but not for other countries..

KOMC FM can sometimes have issues with buffering or so with tunein
